Name: Memory Travelogue
Description: KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris! <color=HighlightB>Head on over to the Memory Travelogue event</color>, collect memories with with the Cubes, and turn them in to KU-Lolo!
QuestDesc: KU-Lolo has a new idea to turn your fondest memories into unique Cube souvenirs in the Second Coming of Solaris! <color=HighlightB>Head on over to the Memory Travelogue event</color>, collect memories with with the Cubes, and turn them in to KU-Lolo!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Hello, {PlayerName}.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: I'm here because I have a favor to ask. Has Encore mentioned anything about the Second Coming of Solaris?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: OK. Simply put, Second Coming of Solaris is a virtual world generated by the Tethys System based on your memory. And I am trying to make it more fun for you.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: ...I felt like something was missing when I was building this world. It turns out I forgot to make a commemorative video of you and your friends!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Since the Second Coming of Solaris has created so many cherished memories for you and everyone else, I want to preserve these memories in the game so they're not lost.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: As for how to record these memories... Ku ku ku, I've already got a plan!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ta-da! Presenting the Second Coming of Solaris Simulator!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: How was that? Does my performance resemble what Roccia Cube taught me?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku ku ku, thank you.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: From a magic pocket linked to the Second Coming of Solaris... Hehe, just kidding.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: This Simulator can recreate your most precious memories of friends to store in the Second Coming of Solaris. Pretty convenient, eh?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Alright, without further ado, let's try it out!

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Looks like the program is running smoothly. It perfectly recreated the moment I wanted to see.

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Why did I turn into a cube?

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Ku ku ku, I did that on purpose.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: After all, Tethys just retrieved the <ano=Control Core>Anniversary Cake</ano>, so we need to save as much computing power as possible.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Besides, I thought it'd be way more fun to watch Cubes reliving the moment!

Dialogues.Speaker: {PlayerName}
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: That last bit sounded like the honest truth.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Well, the truth is yours to imagine. Ku ku ku.

Dialogues.Speaker: KU-Lolo
Dialogues.PlotLineKey: Anyway, I'm counting on you to relive these moments. And if you bring those photos back, you can expect some rich rewards!
